event_editor.title: New event
event_editor.welcome: Here you can create a new event and share it with participants.
event_editor.welcome_again: You are the organizer of this event, and you can edit its details here.

event.name: Give the event a name
event.name_help: Enter a name for your event
event.desc_help: Describe the event to your guests
event.dates_range: Select a date range for the event
event.dates_single: Add or remove single dates or weekdays
event.organizer_help: Let your friends know who invitied them...
event.organizer_email_help: We will use this email exclusively to send you a private link that you can use to manage the event
event.organizer_email_confirmation_help: Please confirm your email here. Even the best make mistakes sometimes...
event.public_participants_help: If the participants names are public, participants of the event can see each other's names.

event_editor.general_info_group: What kind of event is it?
event_editor.event_created: Congratulations! Your event “{eventName}„ has been created. An email has been sent to {eventOrganizerEmail}
event_editor.share_link: Now share this link with your friends to invite them:
event_editor.event_updated: The event details have been updated
event_editor.too_many_requests_error: You have created too many events for {email}. Take a short break...

poll_editor.welcome: Here you can update your availability for this event. Your participant name is: “{participant}„
poll_editor.welcome_new_participant: Here you can enter your availability for this event.
poll_editor.title: My availability for “{eventName}„

poll.participant_help: Tell the organizer who you are...

poll_editor.weekday_ranker_help: Specify which days of your typical week are good {good}, just fine {ok}, or bad {bad} for the event. You can add exception for specific dates later. {help}.
poll_editor.calendar_ranker_group: Which dates work best for you?
poll_editor.really_delete: Do you really want to delete your availability? This operation can't be undone
poll_editor.poll_delete_error: An error has occurred, the availability could not be deleted
poll_editor.date_ranker_helper: Select dates and weekdays that are good {good}, bad {bad} or ok {indifferent} for the event.
poll_editor.date_ranker_help_modal_content: First choose whether you are adding dates that are good {good} or bad {bad}. Then add the dates, either as single dates or date ranges. To remove dates, first select {trash} and then click on them.
poll_editor.weekday_ranker_help_modal_title: Preferences for the days of the week
poll_editor.weekday_ranker_help_modal_content: Give us an idea of your typical week. For example, you might go to the gym every Wednesday and might therefore want to mark it with {bad}. On the other hand, a Friday might be a good day for this event and you might want to mark it with {good}. The remaining days might be just ok, and you can leave them as {ok}.
poll_editor.event_invalid: The event is invalid or already scheduled

event_viewer.no_participants: {icon} The event has not been scheduled and nobody entered their availability yet. Be the first one to answer!
event_viewer.no_participants_organizer: {icon} The event has not been scheduled and nobody entered their availability yet.
event_viewer.schedule_not_found: We were unable to fetch the current schedule for this event
event_viewer.welcome: {organizer} has invited you to this event
event_viewer.welcome_organizer: You are the organizer of this event
event_viewer.event_open: {calendar_icon} The event has not been scheduled yet. Below are the candidate dates so far, based on {answers}. If you haven't yet, please enter your availability
event_viewer.event_open_public_participants: {calendar_icon} The event has not been scheduled yet. Below are the candidate dates so far, based on the answers from {participants}.
event_viewer.event_open_organizer: {calendar_icon} You haven't scheduled the event yet. Below are the candidate dates so far, based on the answers from {participants}.
event_viewer.empty_domain: This event does not specify any selectable dates
event_viewer.event_scheduled: {organizer} has scheduled this event to happen on: {datetime}. {time_distance}.
event_viewer.event_scheduled_organizer: You have scheduled this event to happen on: {datetime}. {time_distance}.

update.title: Update your answer
update.how_to: Enter the name you used to save your answer
update.poll_not_found: No answer found under this name. Did you spell the name correctly?

event_viewer.really_cancel_event: Are you sure you want to cancel the event?
event_viewer.cancel_event_error: An error has occurred, the event could not be canceled
event_viewer.open_event_error: An error has occurred, the event could not be reopened
event_viewer.negative_participants_for_date: Everybody can make it|One person can't make it|{count} people can't make it
event_viewer.positive_participants_for_date: Everybody can make it|One person prefers this date|{count} people prefer this date
event_viewer.positive_participants_list_date: {participants} likes this date|{participants} like this date
event_viewer.negative_participants_list_date: {participants} can't make it|{participants} can't make it
event_viewer.about_to_schedule: You are about to schedule the event to happen on {date}
event_viewer.schedule_event_error: An error has occurred, the event could not be scheduled
event_viewer.select_date_first: You have to select a date from the calendar first.
event_viewer.warning_bad_date: Warning! {participants} person can't make it on this date|Warning! {participants} people cannot make it on this date
event_viewer.select_time: Finally, select a time for the event:
event_viewer.date_selection_help: Dates are ranked from {best} to {worst}. Click on a date to see how many can make it on that day. {red} means that at least one person can't make it. {green} means that everyone can make it. {blue_underlined} dates are the optimal ones so far.
event_viewer.date_selection_help_organizer: Dates are ranked from {best} to {worst}. Click on a date to see who can make it on that day. {red} means that at least one person can't make it. {green} means that everyone can make it. {blue_underlined} dates are the optimal ones so far.
event_viewer.organizer_message: Enter a message for the participants:

home.title: Events made easy
home.subtitle_1: {app_name} helps you find the best date for the events in your social circle
home.subtitle_2: No account needed. We only need your email to send you a link

step1.title: Create the event
step1.part2: Select the time period suitable for the event.
step1.part3: Finally, invite your friends by sharing a Web link.

step2.title: Let your friends decide
step2.part1: Your friends can say if a date is {good}, {indifferent}, or {bad} for them.
step2.part2: They can select weekdays or specific dates.

step3.title: Manage the event
step3.part1: As an organizer, you always have a clear overview of your friends decisions.
step3.part2: {good} and {bad} dates are clearly visible on the calendar.
step3.part3: When you are ready, pick a date, schedule the event and let your guests now.

errors.network: The server is not responding or cannot be reached. Check your Internet connection.
errors.generic: An error occurred while trying to contact the server: {message}
errors.not_found: The requested data could not be found on the server
errors.unprocessable_entity: Ouch! The data you entered contains some errors, or something is missing. Please double check.
